Document.Title: PowerShell and ADSI: Searching the Registry to Find All Available Providers on Windows with .NET Objects

Content:
PS C:\> $key = [Microsoft.Win32.Registry]::LocalMachine

PS C:\> $key.GetSubKeyNames()
HARDWARE
SAM
SECURITY
SOFTWARE
SYSTEM

PS C:\> $subKey = $key.OpenSubKey("SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\ADs\\Provide
rs")

PS C:\> $subKey.GetSubKeyNames()
IIS
LDAP
NDS
NWCOMPAT
WinNT
